text:
@BernieSanders 100% TRUE! Trump needs to leave the COVID briefings to Gov. Andrew Cuomo of New York CNN. Gov. Cuomo is  honest and he listens to his medical, health and science experts. Cuomo in the AM to get the real facts fresh from the front lines. 
#coronavirus #CoronaVirusUpdates #Covid_19
